# typescript/consistent-type-imports <Badge type="info" text="Nursery" />

<div class="rule-meta">
<Alert class="fix" type="info">
<span class="emoji">üõ†Ô∏è</span> An auto-fix is available for this rule for some violations.
</Alert>
</div>

### What it does

Enforce consistent usage of type imports.

### Why is this bad?

inconsistent usage of type imports can make the code harder to read and understand.

### Example

```ts
import { Foo } from "Foo";
type T = Foo;

type S = import("Foo");
```
